Title: The Bastion of Hallowfall
Description:
I have to admit, I did not think that the first visitors we'd have in Mereldar would have been outsiders. I thought the Empire... Well, nevermind.

You have been more than helpful to my people, and that deserves recognition. Mereldar is the bastion of the Arathi in Hallowfall. Take some time, rest.
CompletionText: This city has much to see.
RewardText: It's been good to sit down and breathe for a bit.

Objectives.Text: Meet Faerin, Anduin, and Alleria at Empire's Edge Inn
